LXDE

Desktop environment for all

  • Get LXDE
Learn More

Why you will like it?

  • Less resource needs

    You can use it on your cheap embedded board or salvaged computer.

  • Component-based design

    Don't like something in LXDE, or you don't want to use LXDE but only part of it? You can choose what you like.

  • Familiar experience

    Featuring the interface and shortcuts you can easily get used to.

  • Active community

    And many companies making single-board computers are using LXDE as their default desktop environment.

Want to know more?

Come to our forums and wiki, and get informed from our blog.

  • Forums
  • Wiki
  • Blog

We need your help, of any kind

Become a developer, a documentation writer, translator, designer, package maintainer, tester, user supporter or blogger.
